about_the_game:
About The Game

Welcome to Voltcube, where survival, exploration, and innovation intertwine. Dive into a game that catalyzes your imagination, offering you an infinite canvas of voxel-style opportunities. In Voltcube, we place the reins in your hands, empowering you to carve out your unique narrative within a realm ceaselessly ripe for exploration and transformation.

The World

Journey into a dynamically generated universe, where each new game presents a distinct adventure. The landscapes of Voltcube, all constructed from blocks, stretch to the horizon and beyond, with an array of biomes waiting to be explored. Owing to the procedural generation, no two games ever follow the same narrative, each playthrough is a new expedition into the unknown.

Building

Voltcube's comprehensive building mechanics provide a multitude of options, with an extensive range of blocks that can be used to construct everything your mind can conjure. From humble homes to grandiose castles, from secret underground bases to towering edifices, every structure is a testament to your imagination.

Your Progress

Your journey through Voltcube isn't just about building, but survival too. Exploration is key to finding the resources necessary for progress. The game features an array of machines and tools that can be built to assist you, creating a deep and engaging gameplay loop where gathering resources and building advanced machinery go hand in hand.

Enter the captivating world of Voltcube, and forge your own destiny in this expansive, block-based universe. The only limit is your creativity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 4150
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Discover Voltcube, an infinite, uniquely generated block universe. Create machines, explore a multitude of biomes, and build to your heart's content. Survival or creative, every playthrough offers a unique journey.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
